title: The Path to Healing Is a Humble Path
itunes:title: The Path to Healing Is a Humble Path
description: I have always loved the story of Naaman the Syrian, which is found in the second book of Kings, as part of the Elisha cycle of readings. It is, on the surface at least, a very simple narrative, but it packs a punch spiritually speaking.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
